title: Mongondow - John (Print)
description: Mongondow, or Bolaang Mongondow, is one of the Philippine languages spoken in Bolaang Mongondow Regency and neighbouring regencies of North Sulawesi (Celebes) and Gorontalo Provinces, Indonesia.

language.name: Mongondow
language.area: North Sulawesi, between Tontemboan and Gorontalo.
